ygData.subject: RE: Lighstones was Re: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: No it does not (require batwings) - on the song list I have it says wind but you can sing it.  With 2 bards, it s fun to do aria and selos across Lake Rathe,
ygData.messageBody:
No it does not (require batwings) - on the song list I have it says wind but
you can sing it. With 2 bards, it's fun to do aria and selos across Lake
Rathe, etc. but make sure selos bard runs in back. My new line for running
a party:

"You lead, I'll speed!"

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Lange, Stephen [mailto:SLANGE@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 4:05 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lighstones was Re: Elf Hide
Gloves

From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>

And so noone crucify's me too bad for non-bardic posting.. I
have a question
about the Level 31 Levitation spell. Does it require bat
wings to sing?
